segments.speaker: speaker1.jpg
segments.text: Hello everyone! I'm the male speaker using Coqui TTS. This voice is generated using the VCTK multi-speaker model, which provides a natural male voice for our lip-sync video.

segments.speaker: speaker2.jpg
segments.text: And I'm the female speaker! I'm using the LJSpeech VITS model, which creates a clear and natural female voice. Notice how different our voices sound while maintaining high quality.

segments.speaker: speaker1.jpg
segments.text: We can also use different male voice models. This is the SAM Tacotron model, which has a slightly different character and tone compared to the VCTK model.

segments.speaker: speaker2.jpg
segments.text: And I can switch to the Glow-TTS model for a faster, more efficient female voice generation. Each model has its own unique characteristics and processing speed.
